english.segment1: Guilty and degraded. We've bastardized. ourselves and lost our purity. Guilty and degraded. We've bastardized. ourselves and lost our purity.
english.segment2: Right now you find the words to right your wrongs. Right now you find the words to right your wrongs
english.segment3: Objectify the one thing that I wanted more that you. And I look into your eyes. Sitting here as you walk through the door. The sex that I see. It binds my heart, it blinds my eyes so I give in. I don't want this anymore. I've brought you into my, I've brought you here. You're in my circular parade of failure, of failure. (Run away!)
english.segment4: Right now you find the words to right your wrongs. Right now you find the words to right your wrongs
english.segment5: And I'm sorry for the way my eyes. And I'm sorry for the way my eyes objectify you. Objectify you. Objectify you. Objectify you. Objectify you.
